subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes the configuration properties of the PivotGrid UI component.

subMembers.name: allowExpandAll
subMembers.description: Allows users to expand/collapse all header items within the same header level. Ignored if the [PivotGridDataSource]'s [paginate] property is **true**.

subMembers.name: allowFiltering
subMembers.description: Allows a user to filter fields by selecting or deselecting values in the popup menu.

subMembers.name: allowSorting
subMembers.description: Allows an end user to change sorting properties.

subMembers.name: allowSortingBySummary
subMembers.description: Allows users to sort the pivot grid by summary values instead of field values. Ignored if the [PivotGridDataSource]'s [paginate] property is **true**.

subMembers.name: dataFieldArea
subMembers.description: Specifies the area to which data field headers must belong.

subMembers.name: dataSource
subMembers.description: Binds the UI component to data.

subMembers.name: encodeHtml
subMembers.description: Specifies whether HTML tags are displayed as plain text or applied to cell values.

subMembers.name: enabled
subMembers.description: Enables client-side exporting.

subMembers.name: export
subMembers.description: Configures client-side exporting.

subMembers.name: allowSearch
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the field chooser allows search operations in the *"All Fields"* section.

subMembers.name: applyChangesMode
subMembers.description: Specifies when to apply changes made in the field chooser to the PivotGrid.

subMembers.name: enabled
subMembers.description: Enables or disables the field chooser.

subMembers.name: fieldChooser
subMembers.description: The **Field Chooser** configuration properties.

subMembers.name: height
subMembers.description: Specifies the field chooser height.

subMembers.name: layout
subMembers.description: Specifies the field chooser layout.

subMembers.name: searchTimeout
subMembers.description: Specifies a delay in milliseconds between when a user finishes typing in the field chooser's search panel, and when the search is executed.

subMembers.name: allFields
subMembers.description: The string to display instead of **All Fields**.

subMembers.name: columnFields
subMembers.description: The string to display instead of **Column Fields**.

subMembers.name: dataFields
subMembers.description: The string to display instead of **Data Fields**.

subMembers.name: filterFields
subMembers.description: The string to display instead of **Filter Fields**.

subMembers.name: rowFields
subMembers.description: The string to display instead of **Row Fields**.

subMembers.name: texts
subMembers.description: Strings that can be changed or localized in the pivot grid's integrated Field Chooser.

subMembers.name: title
subMembers.description: Specifies the text to display as a title of the field chooser popup window.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the field chooser width.

subMembers.name: allowFieldDragging
subMembers.description: Makes fields on the [field panel] draggable.

subMembers.name: fieldPanel
subMembers.description: Configures the [field panel].

subMembers.name: showColumnFields
subMembers.description: Shows/hides column fields on the [field panel].

subMembers.name: showDataFields
subMembers.description: Shows/hides data fields on the [field panel].

subMembers.name: showFilterFields
subMembers.description: Shows/hides filter fields on the [field panel].

subMembers.name: showRowFields
subMembers.description: Shows/hides row fields on the [field panel].

subMembers.name: columnFieldArea
subMembers.description: Specifies the placeholder of the [column field area].

subMembers.name: dataFieldArea
subMembers.description: Specifies the placeholder of the [data field area].

subMembers.name: filterFieldArea
subMembers.description: Specifies the placeholder of the [filter field area].

subMembers.name: rowFieldArea
subMembers.description: Specifies the placeholder of the [row field area].

subMembers.name: texts
subMembers.description: Specifies the placeholders of the field areas.

subMembers.name: visible
subMembers.description: Shows/hides the [field panel].

subMembers.name: allowSearch
subMembers.description: Specifies whether searching is enabled in the header filter.

subMembers.name: allowSelectAll
subMembers.description: Specifies whether a "Select All" option is available to users.

subMembers.name: headerFilter
subMembers.description: Configures the header filter feature.

subMembers.name: height
subMembers.description: Specifies the height of the popup menu containing filtering values.

subMembers.name: search
subMembers.description: Configures the header filter's search functionality.

subMembers.name: searchTimeout
subMembers.description: Specifies a delay in milliseconds between when a user finishes typing in the header filter's search panel, and when the search is executed.

subMembers.name: showRelevantValues
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to show all field values or only those that satisfy the other applied filters.

subMembers.name: cancel
subMembers.description: Specifies the text of the button that closes the popup menu without applying a filter.

subMembers.name: emptyValue
subMembers.description: Specifies the name of the item that represents empty values in the popup menu.

subMembers.name: ok
subMembers.description: Specifies the text of the button that applies a filter.

subMembers.name: texts
subMembers.description: Configures the texts of the popup menu's elements.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of the popup menu containing filtering values.

subMembers.name: hideEmptySummaryCells
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to hide rows and columns with no data.

subMembers.name: enabled
subMembers.description: Enables or disables the load panel.

subMembers.name: height
subMembers.description: Specifies the height of the load panel.

subMembers.name: indicatorSrc
subMembers.description: Specifies the URL pointing to an image that will be used as a load indicator.

subMembers.name: loadPanel
subMembers.description: Specifies properties configuring the load panel.

subMembers.name: shading
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to shade the UI component when the load panel appears.

subMembers.name: shadingColor
subMembers.description: Specifies the shading color. Applies only if [shading] is **true**.

subMembers.name: showIndicator
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to show a load indicator.

subMembers.name: showPane
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not to show load panel background.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: Specifies the text to display inside a load panel.

subMembers.name: width
subMembers.description: Specifies the width of the load panel.

subMembers.name: rowHeaderLayout
subMembers.description: Specifies the layout of items in the [row header].

subMembers.name: mode
subMembers.description: Specifies the scrolling mode.

subMembers.name: scrolling
subMembers.description: A configuration object specifying scrolling properties.

subMembers.name: useNative
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not the UI component uses native scrolling.

subMembers.name: showBorders
subMembers.description: Specifies whether the outer borders of the grid are visible or not.

subMembers.name: showColumnGrandTotals
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to display the Grand Total column.

subMembers.name: showColumnTotals
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to display the Total columns.

subMembers.name: showRowGrandTotals
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to display the Grand Total row.

subMembers.name: showRowTotals
subMembers.description: Specifies whether to display the Total rows. Applies only if [rowHeaderLayout] is *"standard"*.

subMembers.name: showTotalsPrior
subMembers.description: Specifies where to show the total rows or columns.

subMembers.name: customLoad
subMembers.description: <!-- %shortDescription% -->

subMembers.name: customSave
subMembers.description: <!-- %shortDescription% -->

subMembers.name: enabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether or not a grid saves its state.

subMembers.name: savingTimeout
subMembers.description: Specifies the delay between the last change of a grid state and the operation of saving this state in milliseconds.

subMembers.name: stateStoring
subMembers.description: A configuration object specifying properties related to state storing.

subMembers.name: storageKey
subMembers.description: Specifies a unique key to be used for storing the grid state.

subMembers.name: type
subMembers.description: Specifies the type of storage to be used for state storing.

subMembers.name: collapseAll
subMembers.description: The string to display as a **Collapse All** context menu item.

subMembers.name: dataNotAvailable
subMembers.description: Specifies text displayed in a cell when its data is unavailable for some reason.

subMembers.name: expandAll
subMembers.description: The string to display as an **Expand All** context menu item.

subMembers.name: exportToExcel
subMembers.description: The string to display as an **Export to Excel file** context menu item.

subMembers.name: grandTotal
subMembers.description: The string to display as a header of the **Grand Total** row and column.

subMembers.name: noData
subMembers.description: Specifies the text displayed when a pivot grid does not contain any fields.

subMembers.name: removeAllSorting
subMembers.description: The string to display as a **Remove All Sorting** context menu item.

subMembers.name: showFieldChooser
subMembers.description: The string to display as a **Show Field Chooser** context menu item.

subMembers.name: sortColumnBySummary
subMembers.description: The string to display as a **Sort Column by Summary Value** context menu item.

subMembers.name: sortRowBySummary
subMembers.description: The string to display as a **Sort Row by Summary Value** context menu item.

subMembers.name: texts
subMembers.description: Strings that can be changed or localized in the PivotGrid UI component.

subMembers.name: total
subMembers.description: The string to display as a header of the **Total** row and column.

subMembers.name: wordWrapEnabled
subMembers.description: Specifies whether long text in [header items] should be wrapped.

subMembers.name: Summary Cell
subMembers.description: An object exposing methods that manipulate a summary cell and provide access to its neighboring cells.

subMembers.name: child(direction_fieldValue)
subMembers.description: Gets the child cell in a specified direction.

subMembers.name: children(direction)
subMembers.description: Gets all child cells in a specified direction.

subMembers.name: field(area)
subMembers.description: Gets a pivot grid field that corresponds to the summary cell.

subMembers.name: grandTotal()
subMembers.description: Gets the **Grand Total** of the entire pivot grid.

subMembers.name: grandTotal(direction)
subMembers.description: Gets a partial Grand Total cell of a row or column.

subMembers.name: isPostProcessed(field)
subMembers.description: Indicates whether the [summaryDisplayMode] or [calculateSummaryValue] post-processed the summary value.

subMembers.name: next(direction)
subMembers.description: Gets the cell next to the current one in a specified direction.

subMembers.name: next(direction_allowCrossGroup)
subMembers.description: Gets the cell next to current in a specified direction.

subMembers.name: parent(direction)
subMembers.description: Gets the parent cell in a specified direction.

subMembers.name: prev(direction)
subMembers.description: Gets the cell prior to the current one in a specified direction.

subMembers.name: prev(direction_allowCrossGroup)
subMembers.description: Gets the cell previous to current in a specified direction.

subMembers.name: slice(field_value)
subMembers.description: Gets the cell located by the path of the source cell with one field value changed.

subMembers.name: value()
subMembers.description: Gets the summary cell value.

subMembers.name: value(field)
subMembers.description: Gets the value of any [field] associated with the summary cell.

subMembers.name: value(field_postProcessed)
subMembers.description: Gets the value of any [field] associated with the summary cell.

subMembers.name: value(postProcessed)
subMembers.description: Gets the summary cell value.

subMembers.name: Pivot Grid Cell
subMembers.description: An object containing information about the pivot grid cell.

subMembers.name: columnPath
subMembers.description: The cell's column path. Available for data area cells only.

subMembers.name: columnType
subMembers.description: The type of the column to which the cell belongs. Available for data area cells only.

subMembers.name: dataIndex
subMembers.description: The data field's index. Available for data area cells only.

subMembers.name: expanded
subMembers.description: Indicates whether the cell is expanded. Available for row or column area cells only.

subMembers.name: path
subMembers.description: The path to the row/column cell. Available for row or column area cells only.

subMembers.name: rowPath
subMembers.description: The cell's row path. Available for data area cells only.

subMembers.name: rowType
subMembers.description: The type of the row to which the cell belongs. Available for data area cells only.

subMembers.name: text
subMembers.description: The text displayed in the cell.

subMembers.name: type
subMembers.description: The cell's type. Available for row or column area cells only.

subMembers.name: value
subMembers.description: The cell's value.

properties.name: dxPivotGrid
properties.description: The PivotGrid is a UI component that allows you to display and analyze multi-dimensional data from a local storage or an OLAP cube.

Methods.name: getFieldChooserPopup()
Methods.description: Gets the Popup instance of the field chooser window.

Methods.name: updateDimensions()
Methods.description: Updates the UI component to the size of its content.

Events.name: onCellClick
Events.description: A function that is executed when a pivot grid cell is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: onCellPrepared
Events.description: A function that is executed after a pivot grid cell is created.

Events.name: onContentReady
Events.description: A function that is executed when the UI component is rendered and each time the component is repainted.

Events.name: onContextMenuPreparing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the context menu is rendered.

Events.name: onDisposing
Events.description: A function that is executed before the UI component is [disposed of].md '{basewidgetpath}/Methods/#dispose').

Events.name: onExporting
Events.description: A function that is executed before data is exported.

Events.name: onInitialized
Events.description: A function used in JavaScript frameworks to save the UI component instance.

Events.name: onOptionChanged
Events.description: A function that is executed after a UI component property is changed.

Events.name: cellClick
Events.description: Raised when a pivot grid cell is clicked or tapped.

Events.name: cellPrepared
Events.description: Raised after a pivot grid cell is created.

Events.name: contextMenuPreparing
Events.description: Raised before the context menu is rendered.

subMembers.name: CellClickEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [cellClick] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: CellPreparedEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [cellPrepared] event handler's argument.

Types.name: ContentReadyEvent
Types.description: The type of the [contentReady] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: ContextMenuPreparingEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [contextMenuPreparing] event handler's argument.

Types.name: DisposingEvent
Types.description: The type of the [disposing] event handler's argument.

subMembers.name: ExportingEvent
subMembers.description: The type of the [exporting] event handler's argument.

Types.name: InitializedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [initialized] event handler's argument.

Types.name: OptionChangedEvent
Types.description: The type of the [optionChanged] event handler's argument.

Types.name: PivotGridDataFieldArea
Types.description: Specifies the area to which data field headers must belong.

Types.name: PivotGridDataType
Types.description: Specifies field values for a specific data type.

Types.name: PivotGridGroupInterval
Types.description: Specifies how the field's values are combined into groups for the [headers].

Types.name: PivotGridRowHeaderLayout
Types.description: Specifies the layout of items in the [row header].

Types.name: PivotGridRunningTotalMode
Types.description: Specifies whether to calculate the running total by rows or by columns.

Types.name: PivotGridSortBy
Types.description: Specifies how to sort the field's values in the [headers].

Types.name: PivotGridTotalDisplayMode
Types.description: Specifies where to show the total rows or columns.
